hero.about: Web developer specializing in crafting unique digital experiences. I love coding, learning and a good cup of coffee. Passionate about multiplayer video games.

about.title: Passionate about creation
about.description: I've always been driven by a passion for creation. From crafting paper models to playing with electronics, I've had an innate desire to bring ideas to life for as long as I can remember. Nowadays, I channel this energy into software development, creating websites and tools to solve both my own and others' problems. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games with friends and taking long night walks.

dokchat.name: DokChat
dokchat.description: DokChat is a comprehensive instant messaging app with group chats, attachments, GIFs, and a Desktop app. Supports customization of user profiles and colors of groups. Comes with DokChat Desktop - Electron desktop client

stocked-up.name: StockedUp
stocked-up.description: StockedUp is complete Inventory Management System that focuses on managing stock for large organizations. It makes managing vast amounts of inventory effortless.
